short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View the linked-data content of the active webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A handy tool that gives better visibility of linked data content by presenting the content of the active webpage in a popup.

Often it can be tedious trying to view the linked data content of a webpage. This tool aims to reduce the repetitive, tedious process of retrieving that data and displaying it in an easy-to-read format.

Features:
 - Preview the linked data content of the active webpage (Note: only JSON-LD is supported in this release, however additional linked-data types will be available in future releases)
 - Interactive JSON viewer
 - Dark mode and light mode
 - Copy the content for external review
 - Links to relevant JSON-LD documentation

This extension is open source:
 https://github.com/kingsthwaiteJ/jsonld-viewer-chrome-extension

Contributors:
- James Kingsthwaite (https://github.com/kingsthwaiteJ)
